resources.string: Test your knowledge of the Master Blaster
"On which ground did Sachin Tendulkar get his first test century ?"
"Which model of Ferrari does Sachin Tendulkar own ?"
"At which ground, did Tendulkar, after getting out on 88,miss out on becoming the youngest ever test centurion ?"
"Which cricketer does Sachin Tendulkar share his birthday with ?"
"In different editions of which tournament did Tendulkar cross 1000,8000 and 12000 ODI runs ?"
\" If Sachin plays well, India sleeps well \"
\" There are two kinds of batsmen in the world. One is Sachin, two is all the others \"
\" I never get tired during umpiring when Sachin is on the crease \"
\" You get Sachin out and half the battle is won \"
\" The more I see him,the more I want to see him \"
\" We did not lose to a team called India, we lost to man called Sachin \"
\" Cricketers like Sachin come once in a lifetime. I am privileged that he played during my lifetime \"
\" Nothing bad can happen to us if we are on a plane with Sachin tendulkar on it \"
\" He has defined cricket in his fabulous,impeccable manner \"
\" Dont bowl him bad balls, he hits the good ones for four \"
"When Tendulkar scored 114 at Perth in a Test in 1991-92, he became just the third Indian to score a Test hundred at the WACA. Who are the other two?"
"Sachin's first ever TV commercial was for which brand ?"
"Sachin believes in one superstition. What is it ?"
"Who was the first bowler to get Tendulkar out stumped ?"
Tendulkar was a ballboy during the 1987 World Cup co-hosted by India.
Tendulkar wanted to be a fast bowler but was rejected by Australian great Dennis Lillee - the former head of the MRF Pace Academy at Chennai in 1987.
Tendulkar is the only player to score a century in all three of his domestic first-class debuts - Ranji Trophy, Duleep Trophy and Irani Cup.
His father named him Sachin after the great musician Sachin Dev Burman.
Tendulkar fielded for Pakistan as a substitute during a one-day practice match against India at the Brabourne Stadium in 1988.
Tendulkar was the first overseas-born player to represent Yorkshire. He was just 19 then.
Tendulkar is the only Indian cricketer to have won the Rajiv Gandhi Khel Ratna, Arjuna Award and Padma Shri
Sachin Tendulkar bats and bowl using his Right hand but writes using his left hand means he is an ambidextrous.
Sachin holds the record for most man-of-the-match awards won by a player on losing side (6)
A huge fan of John McEnroe, Tendulkar grew his hair and tied a band around it to copy McEnroe. He was fondly called \'Mac\' by his friends
